Articles.Content:
Like a lot of you, I have uploaded a lot of craft to KerbalX since I started playing KSP. Some are better than others, but I have a few that I think deserve way more love and downloads then they are getting.

So, not so much a challenge as a collective airshow, post a craft from KerbalX (or if you are not on KerbalX, wherever you may have shared it) that you think should be shown more appreciation. Tell us what is good about (efficiency, fun to fly, heavy lifter etc.)  When you do so, also download at least a few of the craft other participants will post, take a few screenshots and give your thoughts.

 

Here is my entry: VANCE, named after the great Sci-Fi and Fantasy author Jack Vance.

I think it is very maneuverable, fun to fly, forgiving and has a lot of range.  And it is delightfully weird.

 

https://kerbalx.com/Klapaucius/Vance
That must be the most non-Euclidian craft ever
